name: Fly Fly Dragon!
description:
Embark on an epic adventure as a mighty dragon in "Fly Fly Dragon!"

Set in a vibrant and bustling cityscape, this action-packed game thrusts you into the role of a colossal, fire-breathing creature with a singular mission: to halt human evolution and restore the world to its ancient roots.In "Fly Fly Dragon!", your powers as a dragon are formidable.

Harness the intensity of your fiery breath to scorch buildings, reducing them to smoldering ruins. Each destructive act brings you closer to your ultimate goal of reversing the course of human civilization.

With breathtaking visuals, immersive gameplay, and a gripping storyline, "Fly Fly Dragon!" offers an unparalleled experience of destruction and self-discovery. Are you ready to unleash your inner dragon and reshape the world as you see fit? The city awaits your fiery reign. Fly, burn, and conquer in "Fly Fly Dragon!"

Game Features :
- 4 types of dragons
- Destruction of buildings
- Collecting coins
